alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Loup; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 9:28PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Rock, northwestern Loup, southeastern Brown and northeastern Blaine Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 928 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles south of Ainsworth to 16 miles west of Rose to 7 miles north of Brewster. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rose, Hofeld Lake, Fox Bayou, Raven, Duff, Pony Lake, Sybrant, Jones Lake, Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area and Johnsons Corner. This includes Highway 183 between mile markers 145 and 175. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central Nebraska.
